personal.title: Full-Stack Developer
personal.about: Welcome to my page, My name is Avinash Rao and I'm a Full-stack Developer. I graduated from Thinkful's Immersive Software Engineering program in June, 2021. Prior to Thinkful I had no coding experience but I do enjoy coding and designing websites now. Please feel free to take a look at my site and please feel free to connect with me. Enjoy!

projects.aboutProject: Getting stuff done is hard, especially if you are self-employed or need to do things for yourself that you usually put off, like paying bills. There always seems to be something else to do. Enter: the Pomodoro Technique. This popular time-management method can help you power through distractions, hyper-focus and get things done in short bursts, while taking frequent breaks to come up for air and relax.
